pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 5 $(li)Treasure = True $(li)Tradeable = False $(li)Rarity = Rare $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Will increase damage dealt against Artropod (spiders & insects) with $(6)each $() enchantment level

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 200 $(br2)Arthropod receive additional damage scaling with their current health
